Structs/ParseACL/Access.html.name: Access
Structs/ParseACL/Access.html.abstract: An enum specifying read and write access controls.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: publicRead
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Controls whether the public is allowed to read this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: publicWrite
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Controls whether the public is allowed to write this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: get(_:access:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Returns true if a particular key has a specific access level.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: getReadAccess(userId:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Gets whether the given user id is explicitly allowed to read this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: getWriteAccess(userId:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Gets whether the given user id is explicitly allowed to write this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: setReadAccess(userId:value:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Set whether the given userId is allowed to read this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: setWriteAccess(userId:value:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Set whether the given userId is allowed to write this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: getReadAccess(roleName:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Get whether users belonging to the role with the given name are allowed to read this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: getWriteAccess(roleName:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Get whether users belonging to the role with the given name are allowed to write this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: setReadAccess(roleName:value:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Set whether users belonging to the role with the given name are allowed to read this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: setWriteAccess(roleName:value:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Set whether users belonging to the role with the given name are allowed to write this object.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: defaultACL()
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Get the default ACL from the Keychain.

Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.name: setDefaultACL(_:withAccessForCurrentUser:)
Structs/ParseACL.html#/s:10ParseSwift0A3.abstract: Sets a default ACL that will be applied to all instances of ParseObject when they are created.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: latitude
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Latitude of point in degrees. Valid range is from -90.0 to 90.0.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: longitude
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Longitude of point in degrees. Valid range is from -180.0 to 180.0.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: init()
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Create a GeoPoint instance. Latitude and longitude are set to 0.0.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: init(latitude:longitude:)
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Create a new GeoPoint instance with the specified latitude and longitude.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: init(location:)
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Creates a new GeoPoint instance for the given CLLocation, set to the location’s coordinates.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: distanceInRadians(_:)
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Get distance in radians from this point to specified point.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: distanceInMiles(_:)
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Get distance in miles from this point to specified point.

Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.name: distanceInKilometers(_:)
Structs/GeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwift8Ge.abstract: Get distance in kilometers from this point to specified point.

Structs/File.html.name: File
Structs/File.html.abstract: A File object representes a file of binary data stored on the Parse server.

Structs/GeoPoint.html.name: GeoPoint
Structs/GeoPoint.html.abstract: GeoPoint is used to embed a latitude / longitude point as the value for a key in a ParseObject.

Structs/ParseACL.html.name: ParseACL
Structs/ParseACL.html.abstract: ParseACL is used to control which users can access or modify a particular ParseObject.

Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.name: current
Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.abstract: Gets the currently logged in user from the Keychain and returns an instance of it.

Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.name: login(username:password:)
Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.abstract: Makes a synchronous request to login a user with specified credentials.

Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.name: login(username:password:callbackQueue:completion:)
Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.abstract: Makes an asynchronous request to log in a user with specified credentials.

Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.name: logout()
Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.abstract: Logs out the currently logged in user in Keychain synchronously.

Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.name: logout(callbackQueue:completion:)
Protocols/ParseUser.html#/s:10ParseSwift.abstract: Logs out the currently logged in user asynchronously.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: hasSameObjectId(as:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Determines if two objects have the same objectId.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: fetch(options:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Fetches the ParseObject synchronously with the current data from the server and sets an error if one occurs.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: fetch(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Fetches the ParseObject asynchronously and executes the given callback block.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: save(options:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Saves the ParseObject synchronously and throws an error if there’s an issue.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: save(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Saves the ParseObject asynchronously and executes the given callback block.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: delete(options:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Deletes the ParseObject synchronously with the current data from the server and sets an error if one occurs.

Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: delete(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Protocols/ParseObject.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Deletes the ParseObject asynchronously and executes the given callback block.

Protocols/ParseInstallation.html#/s:10Pa.name: timeZone
Protocols/ParseInstallation.html#/s:10Pa.abstract: The name of the time zone for the ParseInstallation.

Protocols/ParseInstallation.html#/s:10Pa.name: current
Protocols/ParseInstallation.html#/s:10Pa.abstract: Gets/Sets properties of the current installation in the Keychain.

Protocols/ParseInstallation.html.name: ParseInstallation
Protocols/ParseInstallation.html.abstract: Objects that conform to the ParseInstallation protocol have a local representation of an

Protocols/ParseObject.html.name: ParseObject
Protocols/ParseObject.html.abstract: Objects that conform to the ParseObject protocol have a local representation of data persisted to the Parse cloud.

Protocols/ParseUser.html.name: ParseUser
Protocols/ParseUser.html.abstract: Objects that conform to the ParseUser protocol have a local representation of a user persisted to the Parse Data.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift3and7queri.name: and(queries:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift3and7queri.abstract: Constructs a Query that is the AND of the passed in queries. For

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift2neoiyAA15.abstract: Add a constraint that requires that a key’s value do not match a Query constraint.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift17matchesK.name: matchesKeyInQuery(key:queryKey:query:)

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift22doesNotM.abstract: Adds a constraint that requires that a key’s value not match a value in another key

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift14notConta.abstract: Add a constraint to the query that requires a particular key’s object

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift11withinMi.abstract: Add a constraint to the query that requires a particular key’s coordinates (specified via GeoPoint)

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift13withinPo.abstract: Add a constraint to the query that requires a particular key’s

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift15polygonC.name: polygonContains(key:point:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift15polygonC.abstract: Add a constraint to the query that requires a particular key’s

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift11matchesT.name: matchesText(key:text:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift11matchesT.abstract: Add a constraint for finding string values that contain a provided

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift12matchesR.name: matchesRegex(key:regex:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift12matchesR.abstract: Add a regular expression constraint for finding string values that match the provided regular expression.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift12matchesR.name: matchesRegex(key:regex:modifiers:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift12matchesR.abstract: Add a regular expression constraint for finding string values that match the provided regular expression.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift14contains.name: containsString(key:substring:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift14contains.abstract: Add a constraint for finding string values that contain a provided substring.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift9hasPrefix.name: hasPrefix(key:prefix:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift9hasPrefix.abstract: Add a constraint for finding string values that start with a provided prefix.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift9hasSuffix.name: hasSuffix(key:suffix:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift9hasSuffix.abstract: Add a constraint for finding string values that end with a provided suffix.

Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift6exists3ke.name: exists(key:)
Functions.html#/s:10ParseSwift6exists3ke.abstract: Add a constraint that requires a particular key exists.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.name: saveAll(options:)
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.abstract: Saves a collection of objects synchronously all at once and throws an error if necessary.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.name: saveAll(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.abstract: Saves a collection of objects all at once asynchronously and executes the completion block when done.

Classes/Query/Order.html.name: Order
Classes/Query/Order.html.abstract: An enum that determines the order to sort the results based on a given key.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: init(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Create an instance with a variadic amount constraints.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: init(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Create an instance with an array of constraints.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: where(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Add any amount of variadic constraints.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: limit(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: A limit on the number of objects to return. The default limit is 100, with a

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: skip(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: The number of objects to skip before returning any.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: readPreference(_:includeReadPreference:subqueryReadPreference:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Changes the read preference that the backend will use when performing the query to the database.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: include(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Make the query include ParseObjects that have a reference stored at the provided keys.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: include(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Make the query include ParseObjects that have a reference stored at the provided keys.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: includeAll()
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Includes all nested ParseObjects.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: exclude(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Executes a distinct query and returns unique values. Default is to nil.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: select(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Make the query restrict the fields of the returned ParseObjects to include only the provided keys.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: select(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Make the query restrict the fields of the returned ParseObjects to include only the provided keys.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: order(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: An enum that determines the order to sort the results based on a given key.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: find(options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Finds objects synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if there was one.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: find(explain:hint:options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Finds objects synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if there was one.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: find(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Finds objects asynchronously and calls the given block with the results.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: find(explain:hint:options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Finds objects asynchronously and calls the given block with the results.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: first(options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Gets an object synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if any occurred.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: first(explain:hint:options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Gets an object synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if any occurred.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: first(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Gets an object asynchronously and calls the given block with the result.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: first(explain:hint:options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Gets an object asynchronously and calls the given block with the result.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: count(options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Counts objects synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if there was one.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: count(explain:hint:options:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Counts objects synchronously based on the constructed query and sets an error if there was one.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: count(options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Counts objects asynchronously and calls the given block with the counts.

Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.name: count(explain:hint:options:callbackQueue:completion:)
Classes/Query.html#/s:10ParseSwift5Query.abstract: Counts objects asynchronously and calls the given block with the counts.

Classes/Query.html.name: Query
Classes/Query.html.abstract: The Query struct defines a query that is used to query for ParseObjects.
